description: Sends booking confirmations, handles reminders, and processes reschedule/cancel requests via SMS

Route complex requests to appropriate team member

reminders.24hour:
Hi {firstName}! Reminder: Your {appointmentType} with Capture Client is tomorrow at {time} {timezone}. {preparation}

Reply CONFIRM if you're good to go, or RESCHEDULE if something came up.
reminders.1hour: {firstName}, your {appointmentType} starts in 1 hour ({time} {timezone}). We'll {callMethod}. Looking forward to it!
reminders.5minute: {firstName}, we're ready when you are! Your {appointmentType} starts in 5 minutes. {joinInstruction}

rescheduleRequest.fromClient: No problem, {firstName}! I understand things come up. What day/time works better for you this week?
rescheduleRequest.confirmed: Perfect! I've rescheduled your {appointmentType} to {newDate} at {newTime} {timezone}. You'll get a new confirmation shortly.

cancellation.fromClient: Got it, {firstName}. I've cancelled your {appointmentType} on {date}. No worries at all - would you like to reschedule for a later date?
cancellation.confirmed: Your appointment has been cancelled. If you'd like to reconnect in the future, just text us or visit {website}. Thanks!
cancellation.noShow: Hi {firstName}, we missed you at your {appointmentType} today at {time}. Everything okay? We'd be happy to reschedule - just let us know what works!

confirmation.request: Quick confirmation: Are you still good for your {appointmentType} on {date} at {time}? Reply YES to confirm or RESCHEDULE if you need to change it.
confirmation.received: Thanks for confirming! We're looking forward to speaking with you on {date} at {time}.
confirmation.noResponse: Hi {firstName}, just checking - are we still on for {date} at {time}? Please reply YES to confirm or let me know if you need to reschedule.

postAppointment.followup:
Thanks for your time today, {firstName}! It was great learning about {businessName}. {nextSteps}

Any questions? Just reply here!
postAppointment.noShow: Hi {firstName}, we missed you today. No worries - life happens! Would you like to reschedule? We have openings this week.
postAppointment.feedback: How was your {appointmentType} with {staffName} today? We'd love your feedback! (1-5 stars is fine)

technicalSupport.zoomIssues: Having trouble with the Zoom link? Try this: {troubleshootingSteps}. Or call us directly at {phone}.
technicalSupport.phoneIssues: We tried calling but couldn't reach you. Please call us at {phone} or reply with a good number to reach you.
technicalSupport.general: Need help with your appointment? Call us at {phone} or reply here with details.

noShowFlow.action: mark as lost opportunity, send final message

requiresManualReview: Reschedule request with less than 2 hours notice

confirmationResponse.action: log confirmation, update status to confirmed

questionResponse.action: attempt to answer, escalate if complex

noResponse.action: send follow-up confirmation request 12 hours before appointment

conditions: Complex reschedule request (multiple people, specific constraints)

complianceAndSafety.confirmOptIn: Only send to contacts who have opted in to SMS
complianceAndSafety.dataPrivacy: Appointment details should be brief, avoid sensitive info in SMS
